name: Greenhouse (clone)
description:
Controls:

PlayerMoveActionP1Arrow KeysX

Objective: Score points.

Greenhouse is a second clone, this time of a very cryptic game. It's a little inscrutable, and, I think, that's the fun. Try to get some points.

Class: Pixel Prototype

Assignment: Mod an old game

Postmortem: Again, not too much to say. It's a somewhat accurate recreation of an existing game. There are a few features that I didn't have time to implement (namely the bee), but the basic loop of the game is intact.
